manifest.name: readdirp
manifest.description: Recursive version of fs.readdir with streaming api.

scripts.test-main: (cd test && set -e; for t in ./*.js; do node $t; done)
scripts.test-all: npm run test-main && npm run test-0.10 && npm run test-0.12 && npm run test-4 && npm run test-6
